column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Enter valid email address, password, and confirm password, 2. Click on the "Sign up" button
column7: Account is created and user is logged in

sep=: Login with a valid email and password pair
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Enter valid email address and password, 2. Click on the "Login" button
column7: User is logged in and redirected to the homepage

column4: User is on the password restore page
column6: 1. Enter valid email address, 2. Click on the "Restore password" button, 3. Check email inbox for the password restore link, 4. Click on the password restore link, 5. Enter a new password and confirm password, 6. Click on the "Save" button
column7: Password is restored and user is able to log in with the new password

sep=: Verify that user is unable to register with an existing email
column4: User is on the registration page
column6: 1. Enter an email address that is already registered, 2. Enter password and confirm password, 3. Click on the "Sign up" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the email address is already in use

sep=: Verify that user is unable to log in with an invalid email or password
column4: User is on the login page
column6: 1. Enter an invalid email address or password, 2. Click on the "Login" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the email or password is incorrect

sep=: Verify that user is unable to restore a password with an invalid email
column4: User is on the password restore page
column6: 1. Enter an invalid email address, 2. Click on the "Restore password" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the email address is not found

sep=: Verify that user is unable to restore a password without clicking on the restore link
column4: User has requested a password restore
column6: 1. Enter a new password and confirm password, 2. Click on the "Save" button
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the password restore link is invalid or expired

sep=: Verify that the password strength requirements are enforced
column4: User is on the registration or password restore page
column6: 1. Enter a password that does not meet the strength requirements, 2. Attempt to proceed
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the password does not meet the strength requirements

sep=: Verify that the password reset link is only valid for a limited time
column4: User has requested a password reset
column6: 1. Wait for the password reset link to expire, 2. Click on the password reset link
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the password reset link is invalid or expired

sep=: Verify that the password reset link can only be used once
column4: User has requested a password reset
column6: 1. Click on the password reset link and update the password, 2. Click on the password reset link again
column7: Error message is displayed indicating that the password reset link is invalid or expired

sep=: Verify that the user is able to log in after restoring their password
column6: 1. Enter the new email and password, 2. Click on the "Login" button
column7: User is logged in and redirected to the homepage

sep=: Verify that the user is able to log out
column7: User is logged out and redirected to the login page

sep=: Verify that the user is able to change their password
column6: 1. Click on the "Change password" link, 2. Enter the current password, new password, and confirm password, 3. Click on the "Save" button
column7: Password is updated and user is logged in with the new password.
